data.title: Lateinische Herrschaften im Orient 1210 bis 1311 by SPRUNER, KARL AND MENKE, THEODOR: (1876)
data.meta_description: Justus Perthes, Gotha - 1876 - Map with original colour and outline hand-colour, 32.2 x 40 cm, seven inset maps, text in German, central fold, slight marginal toning, in very good condition. A most handsome and highly detailed map detailing provinces of the Latin Empire in the wake of the Crusades. The inset maps depict Achaia in Greece, Divisions of the Empire, and a city plan of Constantinople, issued for the "Hand-Atlas f√ºr die Geschichte des Mittelatters und die Neueren Zeit" - Lateinische Herrschaften im Orient 1210 bis 1311
data.text:
Shipping Terms:

The shipping prices quoted on ABEBooks reflect what we have found to be the "average book". Of course in reality there are many books that do not weigh what an "average book" weighs so there are times when we need to requote shipping, just as there are times when we are in position to refund some of the shipping. Please rest assured we try to get your order to you for a reasonable price, as quickly and as well packed (we carefully pack all of our parcels in book boxes) as possible.
